org.nd4j.aeron.ipc.chunk

Class InMemoryChunkAccumulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.aeron.ipc.chunk.InMemoryChunkAccumulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChunkAccumulator

    public class InMemoryChunkAccumulator
extends Object
implements ChunkAccumulator
    Accumulate chunks and reassemble them.
    Author:
    Adam Gibson

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InMemoryChunkAccumulator() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void accumulateChunk(NDArrayMessageChunk chunk)
      Accumulate chunks in a map until all chunks have been accumulated.
      boolean allPresent(String id)
      Returns true if all chunks are present
      int numChunksSoFar(String id)
      Returns the number of chunks accumulated for a given id so far
      NDArrayMessage reassemble(String id)
      Reassemble an ndarray message from a set of chunks Note that once reassemble is called, the associated chunk lists will automatically be removed from storage.

      • reassemble

        public NDArrayMessage reassemble(String id)
        Reassemble an ndarray message from a set of chunks Note that once reassemble is called, the associated chunk lists will automatically be removed from storage.

        Parameters:
        id - the id to reassemble
        Returns:
        the reassembled message

      • accumulateChunk

        public void accumulateChunk(NDArrayMessageChunk chunk)
        Accumulate chunks in a map until all chunks have been accumulated. You can check all chunks are present with ChunkAccumulator.allPresent(String) where the parameter is the id After all chunks have been accumulated you can call ChunkAccumulator.reassemble(String) where the id is the id of the chunk.
        Specified by:
        accumulateChunk in interface ChunkAccumulator
        Parameters:
        chunk - the chunk
